scripts.lina:deploy: yarn run wait_for_sync && LUMOS_CONFIG_NAME=LINA node deploy.js
scripts.aggron4:generate_update_tx: yarn run wait_for_sync && LUMOS_CONFIG_NAME=AGGRON4 node generate_update_tx.js
scripts.lina:generate_update_tx: yarn run wait_for_sync && LUMOS_CONFIG_NAME=LINA node generate_update_tx.js
scripts.arrgon4:deploy_updated: yarn run wait_for_sync && LUMOS_CONFIG_NAME=AGGRON4 node deploy_updated.js
